annonsrubrik: Lead functional architect - SAP center of excellence
annonstext:
Scania is currently undergoing an exciting transformation from a traditional truck manufacturer to a provider of complete sustainable transport solutions. IT is a crucial part of this transformation as Scania’s success is depending on flexible and efficient IT solutions that support current and future business requirements.

Golden opportunity to lead an exciting transformation journey based on SAP S/4 for Industrial side of SCANIA.  

What you get 

You get to work in a cross-functional environment and drive SAP S/4HANA initiatives forward within a team of experienced architects. Our team is open to sharing experiences and learnings and motivates each other to reach our goals.  

You will be the SAP Lead Cross-Functional Architect that will support our multiple business units as a strategic partner from the Center of Excellence. For this, you need to know how to set a roadmap of SAP products & solutions around the SAP intelligent Enterprise. With your experience, you support Scania in its changes management journey to increase the readiness in the organization for change. 
  

What we need 

A lead cross-functional Solution Architect with 12+ years SAP experience. You have taken a lead in previous SAP implementations in multiple modules where your major responsibility will be to act as the SAP ERP liaison to and representative for multiple business units and functional areas. For this exciting role, you need to collaborate with Project Management, IT management, and key business representatives to establish project/request objectives and priorities. We expect you to understand the overall Business and IT Strategic Plans and translate them into IT initiatives while recognizing and introducing enterprise-level process enhancements. 

Questions? 
 Contact FIRSTNAME LASTNAME (Manager)  TELEPHONENO or FIRSTNAME LASTNAME (Tech Recruiter)  TELEPHONENO Apply today! 

Attach your CV and apply before April 6th. Our goal is you give you an update within 7 days after your application.   

 

(We are also looking for a FIRSTNAME LASTNAME SAP Solution Architect in another advertisement)
